Literature.Title: Novel cationic cryptides in Penaeus vannamei demonstrate antimicrobial and anti-cancer activities.
Literature.Author: Abd El-Aal AAA, Jayakumar FA, Lahiri C, Tan KO, Reginald K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:<10% Cell death=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 11774(MIC=0.39µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 11774(MBC=0.39µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MIC=3.12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MBC=3.12µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=0.78µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=0.78µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MBC=25µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MIC=3.12µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MBC=3.12µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MIC=1.56µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MFC=6.25µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(IC50=11.2±0.7µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=8.5±0.6µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=101.5±0.9µM),Human neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y(no activity data),Human rhabdomyosarcoma(IC50=97.8±0.2µM)
